alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 12:50AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Victoria and Goliad Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1250 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Charco, or 8 miles west of Goliad, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Fannin, Weesatche, Weser, Ander and Charco. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 628 and 650. US Highway 59 between mile markers 656 and 676. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
